description: This file sets up an agent with a knowledge base that searches URLs using a vector database, and demonstrates its usage by printing a response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using a language model and knowledge base.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base that searches URLs.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model wrapper for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class for interacting with LanceDB vector database.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types in LanceDb.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data from storage.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent based on a prompt.
